text: @realDonaldTrump This is a statement that is full of GENERALIZATION. I am an Asian American and I am not ANGRY. I’m frustrated that of all the countries impacted by the coronavirus,US is the only country with a leader playing like a VICTIM and DOES NOT TAKE RESPONSIBILITY & no ounce of empathy.
